location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Major Henry Willock, in Charge of His Britannic Majesty's Mission, Tehran

mods.abstract: The letter informs Willock of MacLeod's return to Bushere [Bushire] a few days previously from the Arabian littoral of the Persian Gulf and that he has written to His Royal Highness Hoossein Ali Meerza [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mīrzā] informing him of his arrival and forwarding letters from the Governor of Bombay.
